label: ROSS BOURGER FRIDAY EVENING TO BE FORMAL

resource.chars:
ROSS BOURGER FRIDAY
EVENING TO BE FORMAL

Friday night and Ritchie gym-
nasium will find the Rossbourg
Club and Its guests participating in
the first formal dance of the year.
The hop was promised by the club
officials sometime before Christ-
mas, and every possible moans will
be employed to present one of the
most succssful dances of the season.
Bob lula in person with a six
piece orchestra will furnish the
music for the affair. Bob will tune
up about 10 oâ€™clock and play on un-
til 1 a. m., at which time the Ross-
bourgers will cease to make merry.
Of course the musicians will be in-
terrupted while the usual refresh-
ments are being consumed.
An assessment of $2 will be
charged non-members of the club,
while stags are requested to bring
$1.50 along if they wish to gain ad-
mission.
The dance is the third for the
club which means that only two
more remain on the schedule.
- U. of M.
